text: Approval for a new transducer, new pre-set compression assist function, and other software and computer hardware changes. the device, as modified, will be marketed under the trade name invenia abus and is indicated as an adjunct to mammography for breastcancer screening in asymptomatic woman for whom screening mammography findings are normal or benign (bi-rads assessment category 1 or 2), with dense breast parenchyma (biradscomposition/density 3 or 4), and have not had previous clinical breast intervention. the device is intended to increase breast cancer detection in the described patient population.
